q1: Didn't France win the soccer championship last year?
a1: They have just won the World Cup.
q2: How many world cups =has France won?
a2: France also won the World Cup in 1998. The star player at that time was Zidane. Also, the current coach, Deschamps, played on the 98 team.
q3: Who is France's best midfield player?
a3: N'golo Kante is the best. He's good at passing and wins the ball back from the other team.
